Chat with visitors on your website. They'll see a chat box in the bottom right of your website. You can chat with them, they can chat with you.

How do I get started?

  • Register for a free account at www.jivochat.com
  • Activate the Abantecart extension through the 'All Extensions' menu in abante admin front
  • Copy the widget_id token (Jivo ID) provided in the JivoChat Welcome email or visit the Jivochat account settings,
  • click Manage, add channels, click Live Chat and copy Jivo ID token
  • Paste the widget_id token into the plugin settings, found under Admin > Extensions > All extensions > JivoChat Live Chat
  • To start answer download one of the native JivoChat apps or Open browser Web app
    Mac or Windows iOS Android
Widget ID: Login to https://app.jivosite.com and grab the Jivo token in your channel settings.Your unique jivochat id.
